name: QE Rocket-only
author: JPiolho
description:
Dynamically makes any Quake (id1) deathmatch map rocket-only. There are a few gamemode options you can choose from.

The gamemode(s) can be set by using the console variable: saved1.
You can activate multiple gamemodes by adding the values together.

Gamemodes:
1: No ammo packs
2: No spawn protection
4: No self damage
8: Infinite ammo
16: Health by killing
32: No Quad
64: Random Quad Respawn
128: Spawn with Quad
256: Homing rockets
512: Slow rockets
1024: Fast rockets
2048: Collide rockets
4096: Slow buildup
